title: Development and characterization of bael (Aegle marmelos) leaf extract incorporated chitosan-based functional edible coating and its application on stored tomatoes
content:
Sustainable Food Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4FB00160E, Paper

Sanjib Kr Paul, Himjyoti Dutta, Sayantan Chakraborty, Gunjana Deka, Sudipto Sarkar, Laxmi Narayan Sethi, Sujit Kumar Ghosh
A bael (Aegle marmelos) leaf extract (BLE) incorporated chitosan-based functional edible coating was developed in this study.
